channel.title: Making A Box ? Help Please
channel.description:
You Know When You Type ::help The Little Scroll Appears.. How Could I Possibly Make It So When Someone Types ::commands The Box Appears With The Commands Listed..
Could Some Make The Basic Code For Me?

item.title: Making A Box ? Help Please
item.dc:creator: @server_dude server dude
item.description:
@server_dude wrote:

first add this under the help menu

[code]public void commands()
{

				sendQuest("@dre@MESSAGE HERE", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGE HERE", 8146);
				sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGE HERE", 8147);
				sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGE HERE", 8148);
			        sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGE HERE", 8149);
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGE HERE", 8150);
			        sendQuest("@gre@MESSAGE HERE", 
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGE HERE", 8151);
			       	sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGE HERE", 8154);
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGE HERE", 8155);
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGE HERE", 8156);
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGE HERE", 8157);
				sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGE HERE", 8158);

sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGE HERE", 8159);
sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGE HERE", 8160);
sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGE HERE", 8161);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();

			}

[/code]

THE ADD THIS UNDER YOUR COMMANDS

if(command.equals(“commands”)
{
Commands()
}

wolla

Read full topic
